definition: to blame/to reprove/to reprimand/to expel/to oust/to reconnoiter/(of territory) to expand/saline marsh

sentences.english: The company is spending $781 million to expand its refinery.
sentences.chinese: 该公司斥资7亿8千1百万美元来拓展它的精炼装备。

sentences.english: We have advanced looms and warping machine from Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 公司斥资引进瑞士片梭织机，整经机。

sentences.english: PhRMA is spending millions on advertising to support the plan.
sentences.chinese: 该协会斥资上百万元给医改计划做广告宣传。
